name: 蔡福裕
objective: 本課程旨在教導學生具備獨立思考有機化學的能力;因此課程分為基本觀念(結構式與鍵結),有機化學反應與反應機構以及化合物的製備與分析等三大部分。
schedule:
1. 授課大綱及考試評分規定
2. Atomic and Molecular Structure
3-4. Molecular Interactions and Orbital Interactions
5-6. Isomerism
7.第一次考試
8. The Proton Transfer Reaction
9-10.An Introduction to Multistep Mechanisms
11-12. Nucleophilic Substitution and Elimination Reactions 1
13.第二次考試
14-15. Nucleophilic Substitution and Elimination Reactions 2 
16-17. Electrophilic Addition to Nonpolar pi Bonds.
18. 期末考
materials:
Organic Chemistry
Principles and Mechanisms
Joel Karty
2nd Ed.
